labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: Discord Canary System icon is in place! Behold!
data.expected_result: Account's default Discord profile picture should appear
data.short_description: Default Discord profile picture(s) will not show in Windows 10 Notifications
data.steps_to_repro: - Get on any other server - Receive a notification from an account without a profile picture from any server you are NOT viewing - Look at the notification icon in the lower right corner
